## escapeRegularExpression() function

escapes a string so it can be used as a string in a regular expression constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function escapeRegularExpression(s: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | <code>string</code> | string to escape |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
